https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/78glSgivbuEq2HQQmqAPKHMkiN0.jpg Landscape architect Emil is fighting an uneven battle with those indifferent to the beauty of nature. He is trying to be a good father, but his neurotic rigidity pushes him into a spiral of absurd events. A Beautiful Wildflower Meadow
